definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The phenomenon of measure synchronization is an important property in coupled Hamiltonian systems.
sentences.chinese: 测度同步现象是耦合哈密顿系统的一种重要性质。

sentences.english: The concept of index utility and its mensuration is built up.
sentences.chinese: 提出了指数效用论观点和测度方法。

sentences.english: Third, the basic concept and measuring methods of accounting of sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 第三，可持续发展核算的基本概念和测度方法问题。

sentences.english: This paper proposes an image enhancement method based on image information measure.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于图像方向信息测度的图像增强算法。

sentences.english: Behold, God is great, and we know him not, neither can the number of his years be searched out.
sentences.chinese: 神为大，我们不能全知，他的年数不能测度。

sentences.english: In chapter 2, the thesis discussed the estimation and evaluation to the technological originality in undeveloped regions.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，欠发达地区技术创新的测度与评估。

sentences.english: All the measures are defined at the most detailed level.
sentences.chinese: 在最细的级别定义了所有的测度。

sentences.english: Some people think measure is also a parent structure.
sentences.chinese: 但也有人认为测度也应该是一种母结构。

sentences.english: The measurement function was established by defining single parameter unascertained measurement matrix.
sentences.chinese: 定义参量未确知测度矩阵，确定各测度函数。

sentences.english: The measurement function was established by defining single parameter unascertained measurement matrix.
sentences.chinese: 定义参量未确知测度矩阵，确定各测度函数。

sentences.english: The transaction amount is the only measure needed.
sentences.chinese: 交易量是惟一需要的测度。

sentences.english: The next step is organizing the dimensions and measures into facts.
sentences.chinese: 下一步就是将维度和测度组织成事实。

sentences.english: Together, one set of dimensions and its associated measures make up what is called a fact.
sentences.chinese: 一组维度及其相关的测度共同组成了所谓的事实。

sentences.english: As you can see, the Interest Paid is also a derived measure.
sentences.chinese: 正如您可以看到的，所付利息也是派生的测度。

sentences.english: Methods: Many non-parametric statistic indexes were calculated in order to show a row-column dependence.
sentences.chinese: 方法计算多种非参数统计指标表示行列相关的测度。

sentences.english: Tangent measures can be used to describe the local behavior of a measure.
sentences.chinese: 切测度可用来刻画一个测度的局部性态。

definition: to make reference to/to write about
to use up/to exhaust/to probe to the bottom/limit/end
to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
